drug.indication: as part of an anaesthetic / analgesic combination
drug.sideEffects: increased muscle tone / convulsions, respiratory and cardiovascular depression
drug.pks: acts in minutes by any route
drug.dose: iv anaesthesia: ketamine 5-10mg/kg + diazepam 0.25-0.5mg/kg; cat: ketamine 1.25-2.5mg/kg + medetomidine 40µg/kg; im anaesthesia / sedation: dog: ketamine 5-7.5mg/kg + medetomidine 40µg/kg; cat: ketamine 2.5-7.5mg/kg + medetomidine 80µg/kg; ketamine 10-20mg/kg, xylazine 1mg/kg; analgesia: 0.1 - 1mg/kg iv or 1-2.5mg/kg im, or 2-10µg/kg/min iv infusion
